title: Policy change that promotes economic growth

content.prompt: Which of the following policy changes is most likely to promote economic growth?

choices.label: An increase in tariffs on imported consumer goods
A decrease in investment tax credits for businesses
An increase in taxes on foreign financial inflows
A decrease in tuition fees at public colleges
An increase in tax rates on savings

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
